name: Nisha
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: Many years ago on this day, God decided to send an angel to earth. The angel was meant to touch lives and that happened! Happy birthday my sweet angel! You are the gift in my life, and on your special day, I give you the gift of my love. Take it with open arms, and embrace my hug ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again. By anish :)
